> DO NOT STOP!!!

I'm cruising at hype factor 7, slowly ramping up to maximum levels~

Just occur to me that they may release when spacex launches...

Also it's killing me because I'm scared it will release while I'm in school and I dont want to miss it when it releases

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T15:23:55Z" title="04/27/2015 03:23  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Tanner Rawlings**
The Web is ripping apart. MOAR HYPE!

> 
> This is insane! How on Earth Kerbin do you moderate a thread that moves that fast??
> We definitely went trans-plaid there for a few minutes.
> 
> Happy landings!

It seems pretty self moderating really.
Ahh! Must go faster!!!

> 
> we must do this

Yes. All the HYPE.
9 hours more? T\_T
I'm so proud of you guys! The Hype is so real!
What is SpaceX launching today?
Thats a whole lot of butter.
Oh hey, the server migration page now has an image for me!!

> 
> Ahh! Must go faster!!!

Prepare hype train for ludicrous speed!
Is this the record for hype train threads?
HYPE I've been offline a little while, but I'm back and beta than ever!

> 
> Uwotm8?

He is saying russia is a nice country so smash glasses on the wall.
The suspense is unbearable! More!

> 
> What is SpaceX launching today?

[h=3]Date[/h] Mon Apr, 27 2015 4:55 PM CDT Ã¢â‚¬â€ Mon Apr, 27 2015 7:00 PM CDT 

 [h=3]About[/h] SpaceXÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s customer for this mission is Thales Alenia Space. With this flight, the Falcon 9 rocket will deliver the TurkmenÃƒâ€žlem52E/MonacoSat satellite to a geosynchronous transfer orbit. The Thales launch window is targeted to open at approximately 6:14pm EDT on Monday, April 27, 2015, from Space Launch Complex 40 at Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida. If all goes as planned, the satellite will be deployed approximately 32 minutes after liftoff. A live launch webcast will begin here at 6:00pm EDT.
Quick, call the hype docto!! i'm dying!!

> 
> prepare hype train for ludicrous speed!

she canne take it captain.

> 
> What is SpaceX launching today?

They're launching KSP 1.0!

> 
> Maxmaps tweeted- Crossing t's and dotting lower case j's, this has to be a clue!
> j is tenth in the alphabet and he tweeted that an hour ago and ...... my head is full of hype... where did my thought go?

Is Jeb spelt with lower case j's anywhere in the game? Or is this actually a clue?
We must reach 88 pages per hour to release ksp 1.0!! Come on Marty Kerman!!
Lol, I reloaded it and the kerbal image broke and Kerbin is down further.
We have blown the previous record to kingdom come. Keep it up!
